text:
@WhiteHouse doni says "the cupboards were bare'
he has repeated this claim often
during his Covid Infomercials

however

on March 3rd, he tweeted
"The USA has never been
better prepared to deal with
an Infectious Disease like
The Coronavirus"

Which of these statements is true?
Neither!

domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice
